ide.backend.model

Class ConnectedBlocks

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • ide.backend.model.BlockModel
        • ide.backend.model.ConnectedBlocks

  • public class ConnectedBlocks
extends BlockModel
    This class is used to represent a group of connectedBlocks in the IDE. Every basic block (not Functions or Handlers) will be inside a ConnectedBlock when created. So they can be added to other connectedBlocks or a connectBlock can be added to them. A connected model however has no mapping in the execution.
    Author:
    matthijs

      • tellParentChanged

        public void tellParentChanged(BlockModel child,
                              Variable.VariableType type)
        Description copied from class: BlockModel
        If the parent of a block that its changed so that typechecking or other error detection can be preformed. This is an upwards chain in the tree if models. If this function is not relevant the block can stop the chain by not calling his parent.
        Specified by:
        tellParentChanged in class BlockModel
        Parameters:
        child - child calling this function
        type - type of variable of the child.
